name: Test Transaction API Required Fields Error Message
statusMessage:
AssertionError: The following fields NOT indicated as required by transaction API: ['cc_last4']
assert not ['cc_last4']
statusTrace:
self = <test_required_fields.TestTxnAPIRequiredFields object at 0x7f80dce59050>
txn_samples = <test_data.transactions.TransactionSamples object at 0x7f80ddfa5850>
fw_api = <fw.api.client.FraudwallAPI object at 0x7f80ddfa5810>
required_fields_txn_channel = ({'Billing Amount': 'billing_amt', 'Billing Currency': 'billing_currency', 'Merchant Group Id': 'merch_group_id', 'Merchant ID': 'merch_id', ...}, (6, 'QR'))

    @allure.title("Test Transaction API Required Fields Error Message")
    def test_required_fields_omited(self, txn_samples, fw_api, required_fields_txn_channel):
        txn_channel = required_fields_txn_channel[1]
        required_fields = required_fields_txn_channel[0]
        UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER = f'tt_required_fields_omit_{txn_channel[1]}_{self.current_timestr}'
    
        # Get Base Transaction
        transaction = {}
        # Remove all REQUIRED fields
        txn_fields = list(transaction.keys())
        for f in txn_fields:
            if f in required_fields.values():
                transaction.pop(f)
        transaction.update({
            'transaction_id_ext': UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER,
            'transaction_channel': str(txn_channel[0])
        })
    
        txn_resp = fw_api.send_transaction(transaction)
    
        # Verify no errors
        assert txn_resp.get("error")
        error_field = []
    
        resp_errors = txn_resp.get("errors")
        for f in required_fields.values():
            if (f in resp_errors.keys() and 'This field is required.' in resp_errors.get(f)) or f in (SITUATIONAL_REQUIRED_FIELDS.values()):
                continue
            error_field.append(f)
    
>       assert not error_field, f"The following fields NOT indicated as required by transaction API: {error_field}"
E       AssertionError: The following fields NOT indicated as required by transaction API: ['cc_last4']
E       assert not ['cc_last4']

tests/end2end/transactions/test_required_fields.py:66: AssertionError
